title: MARIPOSA-2: Amivantamab Plus Lazertinib With or Without Chemotherapy in EGFR-Mutant NSCLC After Osimertinib
description: Study evaluating amivantamab combined with lazertinib with or without chemotherapy in patients with EGFR-mutant locally advanced or metastatic NSCLC who have progressed on or after osimertinib therapy.
eligibility: EGFR mutation (exon 19 del or L858R), progression on osimertinib, ECOG 0-1, adequate organ function

title: FLAURA2: Osimertinib With or Without Chemotherapy in EGFR-Mutant NSCLC
description: Study comparing osimertinib plus chemotherapy versus osimertinib monotherapy as first-line treatment in patients with EGFR mutation-positive advanced NSCLC.
eligibility: EGFR mutation (exon 19 del or L858R), treatment-naive, ECOG 0-1

title: PAPILLON: Amivantamab Plus Chemotherapy in EGFR Exon 20 Insertion NSCLC
description: Study of amivantamab combined with chemotherapy compared with chemotherapy alone as first-line treatment in patients with EGFR exon 20 insertion mutation-positive locally advanced or metastatic NSCLC.
eligibility: EGFR exon 20 insertion mutation, treatment-naive, ECOG 0-1

title: KRYSTAL-12: Adagrasib vs Docetaxel in KRAS G12C NSCLC
description: Study comparing adagrasib to docetaxel in patients with KRAS G12C-mutated locally advanced or metastatic NSCLC who have received prior treatment including platinum-based chemotherapy and anti-PD-(L)1 therapy.
eligibility: KRAS G12C mutation, prior platinum and immunotherapy, ECOG 0-1

title: CROWN-2: Lorlatinib vs Alectinib in ALK-Positive NSCLC
description: Study comparing lorlatinib with alectinib as first-line treatment in patients with ALK-positive advanced NSCLC.
eligibility: ALK rearrangement, treatment-naive, ECOG 0-1

title: KEYNOTE-789: Pembrolizumab in EGFR-TKI Resistant NSCLC
description: Study of pembrolizumab plus pemetrexed and platinum chemotherapy versus placebo plus pemetrexed and platinum chemotherapy in patients with EGFR-mutant NSCLC who progressed on first-line EGFR TKI therapy.
eligibility: EGFR mutation, progression on EGFR TKI, ECOG 0-1

title: CFT8919 EGFR Degrader in EGFR-Mutant NSCLC
description: First-in-human study of CFT8919, a novel EGFR degrader, in patients with EGFR-mutant NSCLC who have progressed on prior EGFR-targeted therapies.
eligibility: EGFR mutation, progression on prior EGFR TKI, ECOG 0-1

title: CodeBreaK 300: Sotorasib Plus Panitumumab in KRAS G12C Colorectal Cancer
description: Study comparing sotorasib plus panitumumab versus standard of care in KRAS G12C-mutated metastatic colorectal cancer.
eligibility: KRAS G12C mutation, metastatic CRC, prior chemotherapy

title: Novel Bispecific Antibody in EGFR-Mutant NSCLC
description: Study of novel EGFR-MET bispecific antibody in patients with EGFR-mutant NSCLC with acquired resistance to third-generation EGFR TKIs.
eligibility: EGFR mutation, osimertinib resistance, ECOG 0-1

title: TROPION-Lung01: Datopotamab Deruxtecan in Advanced NSCLC
description: Study comparing datopotamab deruxtecan to docetaxel in patients with advanced NSCLC who have progressed after platinum-based chemotherapy and PD-1/PD-L1 inhibitor therapy.
eligibility: Advanced NSCLC, prior platinum and immunotherapy, ECOG 0-1

title: LIBRETTO-431: Selpercatinib vs Chemotherapy in RET Fusion NSCLC
description: Study comparing selpercatinib to platinum-based chemotherapy with or without pembrolizumab as first-line treatment in patients with RET fusion-positive advanced NSCLC.
eligibility: RET fusion, treatment-naive, ECOG 0-1

title: DESTINY-Lung03: Trastuzumab Deruxtecan in HER2-Overexpressing NSCLC
description: Study of trastuzumab deruxtecan in patients with HER2-overexpressing NSCLC who have received prior treatment.
eligibility: HER2 overexpression (IHC 2+ or 3+), prior chemotherapy, ECOG 0-1

title: Novel MET Inhibitor in MET-Altered Solid Tumors
description: First-in-human study of a novel MET inhibitor in patients with MET-altered solid tumors including NSCLC with MET exon 14 skipping or MET amplification.
eligibility: MET exon 14 skip or MET amplification, ECOG 0-1

title: NRG1 Fusion Solid Tumors Basket Trial
description: Basket trial of zenocutuzumab in patients with NRG1 fusion-positive solid tumors.
eligibility: NRG1 fusion confirmed, ECOG 0-2

title: Mobocertinib Combination in EGFR Exon 20 Insertion NSCLC
description: Study of mobocertinib in combination with immunotherapy in patients with EGFR exon 20 insertion-mutated NSCLC.
eligibility: EGFR exon 20 insertion, ECOG 0-1

title: First-Line Immunotherapy Combination in Advanced NSCLC
description: Study comparing nivolumab plus novel agent versus standard chemotherapy plus immunotherapy as first-line treatment in advanced NSCLC.
eligibility: Advanced NSCLC, treatment-naive, PD-L1 any, ECOG 0-1

title: BRAF V600E Solid Tumors Basket Trial
description: Basket trial of encorafenib plus binimetinib in patients with BRAF V600E-mutated solid tumors.
eligibility: BRAF V600E mutation confirmed, ECOG 0-1

title: IO Combination After EGFR TKI Resistance
description: Study of atezolizumab, bevacizumab, and chemotherapy in EGFR-mutant NSCLC after progression on EGFR TKI therapy.
eligibility: EGFR mutation, EGFR TKI progression, ECOG 0-1

title: HER2 ADC in HER2-Mutant Solid Tumors
description: Study of trastuzumab deruxtecan in patients with HER2-mutant solid tumors.
eligibility: HER2 mutation confirmed, ECOG 0-1

title: KRYSTAL-7: Adagrasib Plus Pembrolizumab in KRAS G12C NSCLC
description: Study of adagrasib in combination with pembrolizumab in patients with KRAS G12C-mutated advanced NSCLC.
eligibility: KRAS G12C mutation, treatment-naive or prior therapy, ECOG 0-1

title: DESTINY-Breast04: T-DXd in HER2-Low Breast Cancer
description: Study comparing trastuzumab deruxtecan to physician's choice chemotherapy in HER2-low (IHC 1+ or 2+/ISH-) unresectable or metastatic breast cancer after prior chemotherapy.
eligibility: HER2-low breast cancer, HR+/HR-, prior chemotherapy, ECOG 0-1

title: KEYNOTE-522: Pembrolizumab in Early TNBC
description: Neoadjuvant pembrolizumab plus chemotherapy followed by adjuvant pembrolizumab in early triple-negative breast cancer.
eligibility: Early-stage TNBC T1c N1-2 or T2-4 N0-2, ECOG 0-1

title: monarchE: Abemaciclib in High-Risk HR+ Early Breast Cancer
description: Adjuvant abemaciclib combined with endocrine therapy in high-risk HR+/HER2- early breast cancer.
eligibility: HR+/HER2- early breast cancer, node-positive, Ki-67 ≥20%, ECOG 0-1

title: OlympiA: Olaparib in gBRCA Early Breast Cancer
description: Adjuvant olaparib in patients with germline BRCA1/2 mutations and high-risk HER2-negative early breast cancer.
eligibility: gBRCA1/2 mutation, HER2-negative, completed neoadjuvant/adjuvant chemotherapy

title: EMBER-3: Imlunestrant in ER+ Advanced Breast Cancer
description: Oral SERD imlunestrant vs standard endocrine therapy in ER+/HER2- advanced breast cancer with ESR1 mutation.
eligibility: ER+/HER2- metastatic breast cancer, ESR1 mutation, prior CDK4/6 inhibitor

title: KRYSTAL-10: Adagrasib + Cetuximab in KRAS G12C CRC
description: Study comparing adagrasib plus cetuximab to chemotherapy in KRAS G12C-mutated metastatic colorectal cancer.
eligibility: KRAS G12C mutation, metastatic CRC, prior fluoropyrimidine and oxaliplatin, ECOG 0-1

title: KEYNOTE-177: Pembrolizumab in MSI-H CRC
description: First-line pembrolizumab versus chemotherapy in MSI-H/dMMR metastatic colorectal cancer.
eligibility: MSI-H or dMMR, metastatic CRC, treatment-naive, ECOG 0-1

title: BREAKWATER: Encorafenib + Cetuximab First-Line in BRAF V600E CRC
description: First-line encorafenib plus cetuximab with or without chemotherapy in BRAF V600E-mutated metastatic CRC.
eligibility: BRAF V600E mutation, metastatic CRC, treatment-naive, ECOG 0-1

title: ctDNA-Guided Adjuvant Therapy in Stage II Colon Cancer
description: Circulating tumor DNA-guided adjuvant chemotherapy in stage II colon cancer.
eligibility: Stage II colon cancer, post-resection, ctDNA evaluable

title: RELATIVITY-047: Relatlimab + Nivolumab in Melanoma
description: First-line relatlimab plus nivolumab versus nivolumab alone in unresectable or metastatic melanoma.
eligibility: Unresectable or metastatic melanoma, treatment-naive, ECOG 0-1

title: COMBI-AD: Dabrafenib + Trametinib Adjuvant in Melanoma
description: Adjuvant dabrafenib plus trametinib in resected stage III BRAF V600-mutated melanoma.
eligibility: Resected stage III melanoma, BRAF V600E/K mutation, ECOG 0-1

title: Lifileucel (TIL Therapy) in Advanced Melanoma
description: Tumor-infiltrating lymphocyte therapy in advanced melanoma after prior anti-PD-1.
eligibility: Unresectable or metastatic melanoma, prior anti-PD-1, ECOG 0-1

title: SWOG S1801: Neoadjuvant Pembrolizumab in Stage III/IV Melanoma
description: Neoadjuvant plus adjuvant pembrolizumab vs adjuvant pembrolizumab alone in resectable stage III/IV melanoma.
eligibility: Resectable stage IIIB-IV melanoma, ECOG 0-1
